item.title: RMarkdown + Blogdown + Hugo + Github + Netlify
item.description: The Plan If you are interested in building your own website where you can sometimes blog and link your blogs with other famous blogging sites such as R-Bloggers and Python Bloggers, you should expect to be very familiar with Blogdown, Hugo Themes, Github and Netlify. If you, like me, are familiar with R/RStudio and a feature in RStudio called R Markdown, which is mostly used for type-setting your code loaded works with expected outputs in file extensions like .
